ygData.subject: monk websites?
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently joined the brotherhood of monks. I am still an apprentice monk in dawn of my years with little experience in battle (indeed with little proficiency
ygData.messageBody:
I recently joined the brotherhood of monks.
I am still an apprentice monk in dawn of my years with little experience
in battle (indeed with little proficiency in it) but I hope that this will
change in the next few weeks.

Lastnight while conversing with a far more experienced monk than myself,
he mentioned a monk website to me that i was trying to check out today.
the URL was something like: www.kadamit.com/eqmonks

However when I try to go to the site, I realize that I have the URL
slightly wrong. Do any of you know the correct URL. Indeed do any of you
know of anyother websites with good information on MONKS?

thank you.

Aslam Ironfist
